features: Great Value Big Pack: 1250* Elastic Hair Bands+50* Seamless Cotton Girls Hair Ties +100*Baby Hair Elastics +12*Butterfly Hair Clips +32*Color Hair Pins +24*Metal Hair Clips +1* Comb with Metal Tail +2* Hair Tail Tools+1* Storage Box

1250pcs in 15 Colors Hair Rubber Bands: 1250 strips of hair elastic bands in a clear reusable organized box, with detachable grids. Each color is packaged separately in one grid.15 vibrant colors of the hair ties that can match your everyday's outfit. These small hair bands are made of high-quality rubber material, with good elastic not easy to break, comfortable to wear.

Seamless Baby Cotton Hair Ties and Hair Elastics Ties: 50* Seamless Cotton Hair Ties +100*Baby Hair Elastics, seamless design and soft cotton material, the kids toddler hair bands are gentle enough to use and not snag or pull your baby's hair,You can use them for children and babies without any worry, match your baby's different dressing and hairstyles in different occasions

Mini Butterfly Hair Clips, Toddler Hair Clips and Color Hair Pins: The set contains 68 pieces hair clips in total. The popular patterns with bright colors fit various kinds of outfits, hair colors and hairstyles, which make your little girl to stand out every day.

Steel Pin Rat Tail Comb: The carbon comb is made of celcon, anti-static and heat-resistant, virtually unbreakable, lightweight and sturdy. This metal pin tail comb is suitable for hair styling, parting, back combing, post styling and hair coloring

Hair Tail Tools: The set come with a small and a large size, take a minute to get the hang of actually braiding it and works fine to give a loose braid or ponytail styling. Brings you a new hair style in seconds!Best Hair Styling Tools
description: Product Description Girls Hair Accessories Kit: Stretchy and Sturdy: Teenitor rubber bands have plenty of stretch, can do multiple loops without snapping, good stretch, don't pull hair, perfect stretch range, works great for thick hair, holds hair well without pull. Fun and Matching Colors: small hair elastics come in fun and matching colors, nice selection of colors, vibrant and pretty cute colors. Versatility: rubber bands are perfect for braiding, great for softball touch-ups, works well for ponytails.good for braids, top knots, and bubble braids. Works well on both thick and thin hair and kids' hair. Good for controlling curly hair and man buns, space buns, perfect for dogs with long hair,works on dogs and cats No More Mess: Individual storage compartments inside the clear container keep hair rubber bands neatly organized and make it easy to choose your favorite colors for styling and securing tiny braids, puffs, and more! RUBBER BANDS for HAIR & KIDS HAIR TIES SET Everyday use and daily different hairstyles; Works well on both thick and thin hair and kids' hair; Good for controlling curly hair and man buns, space buns; Perfect for braiding,including small braids and ends of braided hair and bubble braids; perfect for dogs with long hair,works on dogs and cats; Great for toddlers and young girls. Best Tail Hair Styling Tools 1. Insert this hair styling tool into the ponytail. 2. Let the ponytail pass through the circle of the tool. 3. Pull the hair styling tool down. Such a simple basic hairstyle is completed. RAT TAIL COMB The teeth of these rat tail combs are super fine AND the design features a stainless steel rat tail that can be used for hair styling, teasing, parting, dyeing, and post-styling. Excellent when working with wet hair. Barrettes Metal Snap Hair Clips Accessories Simple snap hair clips, easy to use and attach onto hair.Metal material with coated process craft, smooth surface, hold hair in place well. no slip off.
